alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Laramie Valley; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range; South Laramie Range; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 2:10PM MST until December 24 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches in the lower elevations, with 4 to 8 inches possible in the mountains above 9000 feet elevation. * WHERE...Much of southeast Wyoming along and west of the Laramie Range. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to slick, possibly snow covered roads. Holiday travel may be impacted.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
